TopicTitle: Video Wednesday: 25 ways to sabotage a launch

For those of you that havenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t: Danny likes to challenge the kraken and unleash chaos and destruction upon the Kerbal universe, and this video is no exception.</p><p>Watch how much destruction Danny brings to the table below, and donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t forget to subscribe to his <a href="https://www.youtube.com/user/Danny2462/featured"><b>channel</b></a>!</p><figure data-url="https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DZH4fQX95kXs" data-orig-height="304" data-orig-width="540" data-provider="youtube" class="tmblr-embed"><iframe id="youtube_iframe" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ZH4fQX95kXs?feature=oembed&enablejsapi=1&origin=https://safe.txmblr.com&wmode=opaque" frameborder="0" height="281" width="500"></iframe></figure>

No clipping the launch clamps on the way up? That's been the end of many of my rockets, really wish the clamp arms were longer sometimes, especially for the really big rockets.

In other news, I just found out about that planet destroying claw glitch earlier today and promptly built a torpedo using the Mk2 parts with cargo bays to house the claws.
I was surprised by the old KIA screen, I guess there is old code just sitting in the program?
Now we all know why Danny is not a Dev. Danny, you're the best! Great new jams. Love it as always.
I was not expecting that plot twist at the end. Lol
What's the name of the song at the start?

I like Danny. Been watching his vids since last summer.

Hope that not another 2 month hiatus comes!
